holes.original_proof:
norm_num at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6
try norm_num [hP1, hP2, mul_comm] at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6
try
  simp_all [Polynomial.eval_add, Polynomial.eval_mul, Polynomial.eval_pow, Polynomial.eval_C, Polynomial.eval_X,
    Polynomial.eval_sub, Polynomial.eval_one]
try ring_nf at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 ⊢
try norm_num at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 ⊢
try linarith
try contradiction
